text: "Get a Haircut" is a 1993 song by George Thorogood. It was taken from their ninth studio album Haircut. It went to number 15 in New Zealand, number 28 in Australia and number 43 in Canada. It was the most played song on Canadian FM radio stations. ==References== Category:1993 songs Category:George Thorogood songs Category:Blues rock songs
title: Get a Haircut
